\chapter*{About}

The \textbf{\emph{15th}} International Workshop on Scheduling and Resource Management for Parallel and Distributed Systems will be held at the Kyoto Research Park (KRP), Kyoto, Japan, in conjunction with the \href{https://www.hpcs.cs.tsukuba.ac.jp/icpp2019/}{ICPP'19} - 2019 International Conference on Parallel Processing.

Resource management and scheduling is a crucial task on large-scale computing systems. It plays an essential role in the optimization of resources usage. The goal of this workshop is to bring together researchers and practitioners working in the areas of resource scheduling and resource management to exchange and share their experiences, new ideas, and latest research results on all aspects of scheduling and resource management in parallel and distributed systems including Grids and Clouds.

\hrule
\chapter*{List of Topics}

\begin{itemize}
\item Resource allocation and management
\item Advance resource reservation and scheduling
\item Load sharing and Load balancing techniques
\item Network resource allocation
\item Fault-tolerant resource management approaches
\item Data access and management
\item Scheduling data intensive jobs
\item Scheduling on heterogeneous nodes
\item Time slicing, gang, or co-scheduling
\item Fairness, priorities, and accounting Issues
\item Performance implications of scheduling strategies
\item Performance metrics to compare scheduling schemes
\item Virtualization of resources
\item Energy-Aware Resource Management and Scheduling
\end{itemize}

\hrule
\chapter*{Submission Guidelines}

\begin{itemize}
\item All papers must be original and not simultaneously submitted to other journal or conference. 
\item Papers should not exceed 10 pages in the ACM format at: \href{https://www.acm.org/publications/proceedings-template}{https://www.acm.org/publications/proceedings-template}
\item Submission Link:\href{https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=srmpds2019}{https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=srmpds2019}
\end{itemize}

\hrule
\chapter*{Important Dates:}

\begin{itemize}
\item Submissions Due:        Apr. 15, 2019 =$>$ \textbf{May  5, 2019 (Firm, Anywhere on earth)}
\item Review Decisions:       May  21, 2019 =$>$ \textbf{May 31, 2019}
\item Final Manuscript Due:   June 7, 2019 
\item Workshop Date:          \textbf{Aug. 5, 2019}
\end{itemize}

\hrule
\chapter*{Publication}

\begin{itemize}
\item All accepted papers will be available at the conference in proceedings in USB Flash disk format, and will be submitted to the IEEE Xplore and CSDL for EI indexing. 
\item After the workshop, the extended version of top few papers will be invited to publish on the Journal of Cluster Computing (2016 Impact Factor: 2.04, 5-Year Impact Factor: 2.08, Quartile: Q2).
\item Workshop proceedings is available at \href{https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=3229710}{ACM Digital Library}
\end{itemize}

\hrule
\chapter*{Venue}

\begin{itemize}
\item The workshop will be held at the Kyoto Research Park (KRP), Kyoto, Japan, in the Old Capital City of Japan, on 5 August, in conjunction with the \href{https://www.hpcs.cs.tsukuba.ac.jp/icpp2019/}{ICPP'19} - 2019 International Conference on Parallel Processing.
\end{itemize}
